name: NinjaZ
description:
Help the NinjaZ train his skills to become the best fighting warrior ever!
Simple yet challenging, take boost items to improve the score, and improve his wall climbing skills as fast as you can.
The champions are waiting for you!

*FEATURE*
- Challenging Gameplay
- Leaderboard and Achievement
- Social Sharing
- Great Game Graphics
- Many Boost Items

Run away, Blast away, Fly away, and Have fun!

3fc23bf425
